4. City Secretary

City Secretary
==============

As an officer of the City of Cactus, the city secretary provides communication and cooperation between the city's administration and elected officials.  
  
Other responsibilities carried out by the city secretary involve:

* Responsibility over all paperwork pertaining to the Human Resources department
* Authentication and recording of ordinances and resolutions
* Preparation of agendas for city commission meetings and recording minutes
* Posting legal notices of meetings
* Maintaining records of all council-appointed members on the city's boards and commissions
* Producing city proclamations
* Serving as a notary public for the state of Texas
* Working with Moore County in the handling of elections for the City of Cactus
* Administering oaths of office
* Serving as custodian of records for the City of Cactus
* Administration of property and liability insurance for the City of Cactus
* Providing executive support to the city manager, mayor and city commission
* Executing general administrative tasks under direction from the city manager
* Supervision of clerical staff
